title: Does Shen have a connection with Zoe?
body:
Does Shen have a connection with Zoe, and or Targon?


Shen being known as the "Eye of Twilight" and Zoe being "Aspect of Twilight" will there be some sort of connection?

replies.body:
I just wondered the same thing.

Doesn't shen's job entail watching for imbalance? = change?

Knowing Targon's Aspects, Zoe was probably some kid who climbed a mountain and got a space-parasite shoved into her brain. Beside Targon is on a different continent, so it's unlikely they share anything in common or a connection.
